channel.title: Right click ip ban?

item.title: Right click ip ban?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

I have this already. Umm All you do it make a command, and let the right-click ipban last about 15 secs or whatever you need to right- click ipban.

But this is just a method to make people lazier, can’t they just type:

::ipban playerName

??

Read full topic

item.title: Right click ip ban?
item.dc:creator: @Kyle11594 Kyle11594
item.description:
@Kyle11594 wrote:

[quote=“xdarklight.x, post:1, topic:160054”]Is this waht i have to change for a right click ip ban??

[code]if(command.startsWith(“ipban”) && (playerRights >= 3 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“0 X PK X 0”)))
{
String victim = command.substring(6);
int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim);
client v = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index];
appendToBannedIps(v.connectedFrom);
v.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(“Your ip ban worked…O.o”);
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/ipbanlogs.txt", true));
bw.write(playerName+" ipbanned"+victim);
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging IP-Bans!");
}
  }

}[/code]

Or this

[code]public void appendToBannedIps (String player) {

  BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/bannedips.txt", true));
 bw.write(player);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error ip banning user!");
 }
  }

[/code]

IM not shure >.<[/quote]

Does that first code let you do ::ipban (playername) and Ip ban them?

Read full topic

ioe.printStackTrace();

if (bw != null) try {

}[/code]
